Worcester.Harry Goddard House: The Harry Goddard House is an historic house at 190 Salisbury Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. The 2.5 story wood frame Colonial Revival house was designed by architect George Clemence, and built in 1905 for Harry Goddard, president of the Spencer Wire Company. Its main facade features semicircular bay windows flanking a center entrance, which is topped on the second floor by a Palladian window.
